name: ZANNA - Farewell to a Friend
description:
Who is Zanna?

Zanna is a young woman with a heart full of love and a spirit full of adventure. She had always been a bit of a wanderer, and had a special companion by her side on all of her travels: the small, squirrel - like animal named Koda.

Koda had been with Zanna for many years, and was like a loyal and constant friend. But unfortunately, Koda had recently passed away, leaving Zanna feeling lost and alone.

In an effort to remember all of the good times she had shared with Koda and to find some sense of closure, Zanna decided to take a walk through the nearby forest where they had made so many memories together.

What can you expect?

As the player, you can accompany Zanna on her journey and let her tell you about all the fond memories she's collected with Koda in a 3D side scroller with illustrations of their past. 

This Game is more like a short playable teaser, I hope that you still find joy with it <3 

Controls Credits

Music - WeLoveIndies, Epidemicsounds

Voice - ReplicaStudio

Water Shader - Tidal Flask Studios FANTASTIC village pac
